name: Destoke: Alley
description:
DESTOKE: Alleyway
4-player multiplayer deathmatch

This is a simple arena multiplayer deathmatch level done in FPS Creator.  This is a demo of a full multiplayer game called "Destoke" which will release sometime later this year.

Thanks to Nomad Soul & s4real for  Black Ice Mod.
Thanks to Dark Lord for bug-fixes and making it playable.

Please read the README.txt file before playing. Thank you!
